Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Joan10024
Reviews.Content: The camera is what I had wanted and I am having a great time learning more about using it. A joy using it.  Canon EOS 7D 18 MP CMOS Digital SLR Camera with 3-Inch LCD and 18-135mm f/3.5-5.6 IS UD Standard Zoom Lens

Reviews.Title: Canon 7D
Reviews.Author: Mike H
Reviews.Content: I have owned several other DSLR's cameras but none compare to the 7D. I think it is an excellent camera for a serious amature. The camera is well balanced and the features are awsome.

Reviews.Title: I love My 7D
Reviews.Author: LD Designs
Reviews.Content: I love this camera. Very fast, really easy to use. I have the Canon EF-S 18-135mm f/3.5-5.6 IS UD Standard Zoom Lens. Also the Canon EF 50mm f1.4 USM and I can bealieve the quality of the pictures. Especially pictures with the 50mm Are very sharp, very professional looking.  I would highly recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: canon 7D
Reviews.Author: bill lenski
Reviews.Content: This is one the most amazing cameras on the market . I does every thing you could expect a camera to do . I takes a while to learn all of its features but it never ceases to amaze me when i learn something new . A must have if you serious about photography .

Reviews.Title: The perfect camera for amateur & pro photographers
Reviews.Author: Kenn71
Reviews.Content: The Canon EOS7D is easy and fun to work with,it takes beautiful photo's.You can start taking photo's once you have set it up,all the controls and menu's are easy to get to.I recamend this camera to anyone who wants to take great photo's that will last a life time.

ProductInfo.Features:
18-135mm f/3.5-5.6 IS Lens
LP-E6 Rechargeable Lithium-ion Battery
LC-E6 Battery Charger
USB Interface Cable IFC-200U
Stereo AV Cable AVC-DC400ST
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS 7D Digital Camera with 18-135mm f/3.5-5.6 IS Lens Kit
